thread.title: Perseid meteor shower lights up night skies, in pictures
thread.title_full: Perseid meteor shower lights up night skies, in pictures - MarketWatch

author: Michelle Coffey
title: Perseid meteor shower lights up night skies, in pictures
text:
Reuters A stargazer near Bobcaygeon, Ontario. Slide 1 of 12 The Perseid meteor shower reached its peak overnight Wednesday into Thursday morning, giving sky watchers in the Northern Hemisphere a glimpse of some of the fastest and brightest shooting stars of the year.
For the first time in eight years, the Perseid shower occurred ahead of a new moon, providing perfect viewing conditions with a completely dark night sky. At its peak, 100 meteors per hour could be seen streaking across the sky.
Perseid Meteor Showers in 30 Seconds (0:34) Photo: Getty Images
Here’s how the skies looked around the world:
